contexts.context: Arkay's Blessing <mark>prevents</mark> the souls of men, beastmen, and elves from being...
..., and elves from being used without consent. Arkay's Law <mark>prevents</mark> those buried with the proper rituals from being raised to serve...
...is a colossal magical artifact that completely encircles Red Mountain and <mark>prevents</mark> the Blight from spilling its corruption across the rest of Vvardenfell...
